name: Chelsea Apps Factory
tag_list: apps, google, android, apple, ios, iphone, ipad, ipod, microsoft, windows, phone, 7, wp7, nokia, ovi, rim, blackberry, games, enterprise, itunes, store, marketplace
overview:
Professionalising the App industry Drawing from senior experience in marketing, management & sales as well as innovation, technology & software engineering, we are bringing Order to the Disorder.

Through our tried & tested agile process we deliver amazing Apps for global brands, in an ordered, managed and measured way.

Customer in the room The customer is central to our process. And it works. By putting the customer in in the room, we gain the understanding of the business, brand and rationale for an App.

We transpose this understanding into successful Apps that have engaging User Experiences (UX) with well-designed User Interfaces (UI).

Platform agnostic Platform expertise We Produce, Promote and Productise App ideas on platforms that are relevant to the brand, client and end user.And with world class expertise in Google Android, Apple iOS (iPhone/iPad/iPod), Microsoft Windows Phone 7 (WP7) plus RIM/Blackberry and Nokia Symbian we know how to get the best out of each platform.

Come and say hello We support Mobile Monday London, a grass roots community for folk with an interest in mobile technology and how it’s used. We’re always at the monthly events, come and join us! www.mobilemonday.org.uk

offices.address2: The Old Gas Works, 2 Michael Road
